work.description: Software service company for the product Sage X3, PTC Creo & WindChill, Salesforce & Ansys Simulation.
work.summary:
_This position is issued from a company takeover._

Where I pursue my various task of **technical consultant engineer** on Sage X3. 
As well my roles of **Product owner** and **Technical leader** for the Sage X3 Add-on "RichMail By Logtimiz" and the "In-House" built ticketing application.

work.name: Logtimiz
highlights: In charge of one full-time web developer
Complex add-on development environment to support a wide range of Sage X3 version (from v7 to v12)
Developed intern tools for Add-on deployment, certificates and licenses generation (Tauri desktop application)
Learn how to dialog and interact with a wide range of customers size (from couple people organization to multi-national corporation
work.description: Software service company for the product Sage X3.
work.summary:
Responsible of the "In-House" built ticketing application interconnected with the ERP Sage X3 (Product owner and Technical lead).

Strong from my problem solving skills and my experience in ticketing I became in charge of wider project with the analysis, estimate, and realization of custom adaptations on the ERP Sage X3. While still being a technical consultant engineer in the support team. 

I'm also the author of the "RichMail By Logtimiz" Sage X3 Add-on who enhance the mailing capabilities of Sage X3.

work.name: Logtimiz
work.description: Software service company for the product Sage X3.
work.summary:
I pursued the work done in my internship as the principal maintainer of the ticketing web application, now in production. Being in charge of various task from bug/hotfixes, development of the new feature requested by my co-worker and our customer to the maintenance of the production application and delivery of new releases.

In addition, I join the support team to sharpen my Sage X3 knowledge, customer relationship skills.

work.name: Logtimiz

work.summary:
Analysis and design of a web application combining customer space and support space based on the Symfony framework.
 Real-time interconnection of the web application with the company ERP (Sage X3).

Various position as a student and/or summer job.
From tutor for elementary/high-school student to Crew member at Pizza Hut or Universal agent in a movie theater.
